item.title: Teaching & mentoring
item.description: If you’re interested in working with me please see here for more information. Postdoctoral scholars Gwen Eadie, 2017- Tim Thomas, 2017- Tsuyoshi Kunihama (2016-2017), now Assistant Professor in the Department of Economics at Kwansei Gakuin University Ph.D. Students Zehang (Richard) Li, Ph.D. (2018, currently postdoctoral scholar at Yale Biostatistics) Mengjie Pan, current statistics Ph.D. student Austin Schumacher, current biostatistics Ph.D. student Wesley Lee, current statistics Ph.D. student Masters and undergraduate students Alina Arseniev-Koehler, UW Sociology undergraduate thesis, now Ph.
